Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and capabilities, I believe its true value exceeds $12000. Considering its unparalleled benefits and the satisfaction it can bring to you, I am offering this remarkable product to you for $15000. This exclusive opportunity allows you to secure this masterpiece at a competitive price, ensuring you receive the best value for your investment. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this extraordinary product into your life. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
